name: Lexus ES
description: The price of Lexus ES, a 5 seater Sedan, ranges from Rs. 63.10  - 69.70 Lakh. It is available in 2 variants, with an engine of 2487 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Automatic. ES has an NCAP rating of 5 stars and comes with 10 airbags. Lexus ES has a ground clearance of 150 mm  and is available in 6 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 22.5 kmpl for ES.

variants.variant_name: ES 300h Exquisite 2487 cc, Hybrid (Electric + Petrol), Automatic (e-CVT), 22.5 kmpl, 176 bhp
ES 300h Luxury 2487 cc, Hybrid (Electric + Petrol), Automatic (e-CVT), 22.5 kmpl, 176 bhp
